alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 9:14PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Umatilla County through 945 PM PDT... At 914 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rieth, or near Pendleton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pendleton, Adams, Cayuse, Mission, Rieth and northwestern Umatilla Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
